subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: With the possibility of a fifth Wimbledon title growing larger on the horizon, Serena Williams’s serve has made the difference, drawing gasps from the crowd and grim looks from opponents.
snippet: With the possibility of a fifth Wimbledon title growing larger on the horizon, Serena Williams’s serve has made the difference, drawing gasps from the crowd and grim looks from opponents.
